Childhood.Title: Dumb punk
Childhood.BaseDesc: NAME was a worthless child. Despite being born into a decent family, HE failed to live up to expectations, spending his time selling knockoff cigarettes to 15-year-olds.

Adulthood.Title: Bad magician
Adulthood.BaseDesc: NAME was an incompetent magician who performed for low wages - usually in front of children. The children were usually very bored, because he is very lazy.
